title: Shrine Plaque Wish!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Nozomi-san, Nozomi-saaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Setsuna-chan, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Nozomi-san, remember when I asked you for a fortune about something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Of course. You were worried that a novel that you really loved wouldn’t be published anymore, right? What happened? Did a new volume come out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yup! The novel is also getting a comic adaptation!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Oh! That’s great to hear!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You told me to write my wish onto a shrine plaque, so I did that. And also, today is the release day of the first volume of the comic, so I thought it would be nice if you’d read it, Nozomi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Did you bring a copy for me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! I highly, highly recommend it, so please give it a read.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Thank you very much. I’d love to hear what you think about it afterward, Setsuna-chan. ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
